title: Data Transfer Rate Converter – Convert Network Speeds (bps, Kbps, Mbps, MB/s)

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Bit vs byte reminder 1 byte = 8 bits Therefore: 8 Mbps ≈ 1 MB/s (ignoring overhead)

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: General formula Let v be the value, kfrom the factor to convert the source unit to bits per second, and kto the factor for the target unit. bps = v × k_from result = bps ÷ k_to

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Download time formula time (s) = total bits ÷ bits per second

changes: Initial audit spec draft generated from HTML extraction (review required).
